actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing the Honorable Thomas S. Foley of Washington as Speaker pro tempore during the absence of the Speaker.

summary.text: Elects Representative Thomas S. Foley, of Washington, as Speaker pro tempore during any absence of the Speaker until October 15, 1984.

titles.title: A resolution electing the Honorable Thomas S. Foley of Washington as Speaker pro tempore during the absence of the Speaker.
